listitem.simpara: Debian packages have been updated to Debian Stretch (45642, 45709).

The packages univention-ldap, univention-directory-notifier, univention-bind, univention-heimdal, univention-postgresql and univention-appcenter now use the command service instead of invoke-rc.d to restart services. This is necessary for the services to be restarted during the UCS installation (45905, 46055).
XS-Python-Version and XB-Python-Version have been removed from all packages(43336).
The packages related to the DVD build process had to be updates to work with Debian Stretch (45868).
A typing error in the welcome screen has been corrected (45819).
OpenLDAP has been updated to version 2.4.45 (44834).
The krb5-kdc.schema has a new attribute krb5ExtendedAttributes (45996).
The test in the slapd's update scripts, whether the system is a UCS system, has been changed (45936).
The bind9 init script restarts the service only if the &ucsUCRV; dns/backend is set (45341).
The package univention-web now depends on univention-apache (45893).

In certain situations after reloading the browser window the error message "There are no modules available for the currently authenticated user" was incorrectly displayed. The behavior has been repaired (44068).

section.title: &ucsUDM; UMC modules and command line interface

listitem.simpara: The UDM options posix, samba> and kerberos of users have been removed. User objects now must have all object classes of these options. After the upgrade to UCS 4.3 all existing user objects, groups and user templates are migrated into the new LDAP format. It is necessary that the primary group of every user has the samba option enabled and the domain must have a Kerberos realm defined. A new UDM object type users/ldap has been added which can be used as a simple authentication account. Objects of users/ldap may authenticate via an LDAP bind and are not counted into the license. The UDM option ldap_pwd has been removed from user objects. User objects which had only the ldap_pwd option enabled are migrated into users/ldap objects. Note: UCS systems which are older than UCS 4.3-0 may create user objects in the old format and must be migrated. The UMC module System diagnosis and the script /usr/share/univention-directory-manager-tools/univention-migrate-users-to-ucs4.3 can be used to detect necessary changes and migrate user objects. 45842.
The values for the syntax class Country have been updated 45926.
The syntax class Base64Bzip2XML has been adjusted to allow >text/xml> input data (45941).
In certain situations after locking and unlocking a user object the password was accidentally modified to one of password, ********, {KINIT} or {SASL}. This problem has been corrected (45877, 45879).
The robustness of the LDAP directory module has been improved: Corrupt objects will simply be ignored in the listing (46193).

section.title: Modules for system settings / setup wizard

listitem.simpara: The script startxwithfirefox now starts services in a change root environment during the installation (45895).
The module has been adjusted to the new API of python-psutil (45927).
The module's search query produces better results (33198).
Empty categories are now hidden in the module's search field (29733).
A warning has been added in the system services UMC module when stopping the service causes a interruption of the connection (26477).

In UCS 4.3, MySQL was replaced with MariaDB. The package univention-mysql will not install a MariaDB server on UCS 4.3. The change is transparent, if the package univention-mysql was installed on UCS 4.2, MariaDB will be installed during the update (45876).
A systemd script for the univention-saml instance of memcached has been added (45960).
The univention-saml configuration for stunnel4 has been adapted to Debian Stretch (45882).

Nagios has been updated to version 4.3.4 (45942). In this new version the default configuration directory has changed from /etc/nagios3/ to /etc/nagios/. Also the cache and log directories have been renamed to /var/cache/nagios/ and /var/log/nagios/. During the update all files from /etc/nagios3/conf.local.d/ and /etc/nagios3/conf.univention.d/ and the log and cache files are moved to the new directories to ensure a smooth transition. Nevertheless the Nagios configuration should be manually checked after the update (nagios -v /etc/nagios/nagios.cfg).
The package univention-apache now depends on apache2 (45893).
The mpm_prefork handling and &ucsUCR; templates in univention-apache has been adapted to Debian Stretch (45857, 46065).
The &ucsUCRV; apache2/ssl/v3 has been removed (45922).

The php dependencies have been removed from the univention-apache package. Also the &ucsUCRV;s php/memory/limit, php/limit/postsize, php/limit/filesize, php/limit/inputtime, php/memory/executiontime and php/limit/sockettimeout to configure the php.ini have been removed. To configure PHP settings /etc/php/7.0/apache2/php.ini or /etc/php5/apache2/php.ini can be modified manually (46121).

The package univention-mail-dovecot has updated the configuration files of Dovecot to match those of upstream version 2.2.27 (45966). User interaction is only needed if a local configuration has touched the following configuration keys:
The configuration key sieve_dir has been removed, as it is now part of the configuration value of sieve (see conf.d/90-sieve.conf).
The configuration key sieve_global_dir has been renamed to sieve_global (see conf.d/90-sieve.conf).
Dovecot does not support SSLv2 anymore.
The package univention-mail-postfix has updated the configuration files and start script of Postfix to match those of upstream version 3.1.6 (45963).

The format of the configuration file /etc/postfix/dynamicmaps.cf has changed in Postfix 3. The file will be saved to /etc/postfix/dynamicmaps.cf.postfix2 and removed before upgrading. The Postfix 3 packages will recreate it in the new format during the upgrade to UCS 4.3 (45968).
The package univention-antivir-mail has updated the configuration files of ClamAV to match those of upstream version 0.99.2 (45969).

The Squid proxy server has been updated to version 3.5.23. During this update all configuration files are moved from /etc/squid3 to /etc/squid. This includes the &ucsUCRV; template /etc/squid/squid.conf but also user configurations like /etc/squid/local.conf, /etc/squid/local_rules.conf etc.. All old configuration files are saved before the update in the directory /etc/squid3-update-4.3 (45935).
Samba has been updated to version 4.7.4 (45326). The UCS firewall has been adjusted to also ACCEPT port 49152. For details see Samba 4.7 Features added/changed.
The following packages have been added to the maintained section of the software repository: python-winrm (45783)
The dependency of univention-java has been changed from openjdk-7-jre and icedtea-7-plugin to openjdk-8-jre and icedtea-plugin (45959).
The list of available PPD printer driver has been updated in univention-printserver. No longer available drivers are marked as deprecated (45958).

OpenSSH has been updated from version 6.7 to 7.4 containing backward incompatible changes: The old SSH v.1 protocol has been removed. Many legacy algorithms have been disabled, as they are considered cryptographically weak nowadays. The &ucsUCR; template file for openssh has been updated accordingly: The deprecated &ucsUCRV;s sshd/Protocol and sshd/ServerKeyBits have been removed. The privilege separation mode has been changed to the new default sandbox. All other settings have been reviewed and reset to their default value if appropriate (46033).
Package dependencies have been updated in univention-kde (45943).
The univention-runit configuration has been adapted to Debian Stretch (45861).
The ntp init script has been removed from univention-base-files. Instead the init script provided by ntp is being used (46071).
